name: ITLibrary
desc: This class serves as the entry point to the iTunesLibrary framework.

items.name: init(apiVersion: String)
items.desc: Initializes an instance of ITLibrary that can retrieve media entities.

items.name: init(apiVersion: String, options: ITLibInitOptions)
items.desc: Initializes an instance of ITLibrary that can retrieve media entities.

items.name: enum ITLibInitOptions
items.desc: These constants describe initialization options for an iTunes library.

items.name: var allMediaItems: [ITLibMediaItem]
items.desc: All the media items (tracks) in the iTunes library.

items.name: var allPlaylists: [ITLibPlaylist]
items.desc: All the playlists in the iTunes library.

items.name: var apiMajorVersion: Int
items.desc: The major version number of the API the iTunesLibrary framework exposes.

items.name: var apiMinorVersion: Int
items.desc: The minor version number of the API the iTunesLibrary framework exposes.

items.name: var applicationVersion: String
items.desc: The version of iTunes that created or modified the iTunes library youâ€™re accessing.

items.name: var mediaFolderLocation: URL?
items.desc: The location of the iTunes music folder.

items.name: var shouldShowContentRating: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to show content rating labels.

items.name: func reloadData() -> Bool
items.desc: Refreshes the data that the framework uses.

items.name: func unloadData()
items.desc: Unloads the data that the framework uses.

items.name: func artwork(forMediaFile: URL) -> ITLibArtwork?
items.desc: Retrieves the artwork from a media file that may or may not be in the iTunes library.

items.name: var features: ITLibExportFeature
items.desc: A bitwise OR combination of the features of this library.

items.name: enum ITLibExportFeature
items.desc: These constants describe the features that an iTunes library supports.

items.name: var musicFolderLocation: URL?
items.desc: The location of the iTunes music folder.
